When he 's not roaring his way through Metallica shows , James Hetfield likes to take to the great outdoors and hunt .
That hobby has earned him a gig narrating an eight - episode History Channel series called ' The Hunt , ' beginning June 8 at 10 p.m. ET .

A1: the annual controlled hunt in Alaska
RelatedSentence: The program chronicles the annual controlled hunt in Alaska for Kodiak brown bears , which can grow to 12 - feet tall and some 1,500 pounds .
This tradition goes back centuries to the region 's early Alutiiq people , though its now strictly regulated by the state department of fish and game .
Each year , thousands of sportsmen apply to participate in the Kodiak Island hunt , with fewer than 500 lottery - system passes handed out .
These events typically last 10 days , and hunters spend the bulk of that time living off the land with only the supplies they 've brought along .
